offer_summary.job_description: We are seeking a Lead Software Engineer to lead and mentor a talented technical team in the exploration and implementation of Generative AI and other innovative new technologies. The ideal candidate will design and whiteboard solutions, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and guide the full lifecycle of development from initial design to production deployment.
requirements: [Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field]
[Minimum of 4-5 years of experience in technical leadership]
[Passion for learning and applying new technologies]
[Extensive hands-on experience deploying scalable cloud-based solutions]
requiered_skills: [Proficient in Google Cloud Platform services like Vertex AI]
nice_to_have_skills: [Experience building and deploying machine learning models]
benefits: [Sharing the costs of professional training & courses]
